item.caption: Max number of rooms
item.comment: The maximum number of rooms which can be created in the chat.

item.caption: User types
item.comment: Use user types in the chat. Users of different types have different capabilities.

item.caption: Default user type
item.comment: The type which will be granted to newly joined user.

item.caption: Use sounds
item.comment: Use sound on different chat events(login, change room, start/stop video transfer and etc)
